title: Confidential Secretary Job at Amies Recruitment Agency
content:
Amies Recruitment Agency is a bridge company that connects employers to the right talent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Confidential Secretary
Job Location: Life Camp, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Schedule: Monday to Saturday (with flexible hours as may be required by management).

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Confidential Secretary will provide high-level administrative and secretarial support to management while maintaining strict confidentiality on all sensitive matters.
	She will be responsible for managing schedules, correspondence, and documentation, ensuring efficiency, discretion, and professionalism in all aspects of her work.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle confidential correspondence, files, and documents with utmost discretion.
	Manage and organize executive schedules, appointments, and meetings.
	Take minutes of meetings and ensure timely follow-up on assigned actions.
	Draft, review, and edit memos, letters, and other business documents.
	Coordinate internal and external communications on behalf of management.
	Maintain proper filing systems—both digital and physical—for easy record retrieval.
	Assist in preparing reports, presentations, and other management materials.
	Receive visitors and attend to calls with professionalism.
	Perform other administrative and support duties as assigned.


Requirements


	OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Secretarial Studies, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Proven experience as a secretary, personal assistant, or administrative officer.
	Must be female and single (preferred).
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
	Strong written and verbal communication abilities.
	High level of integrity, discretion, and confidentiality.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Smart appearance and professional demeanor.


Salary
N65,000 - N80,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: amiesrecruitmentagency@gmail.com using "Application for Confidential Secretary" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
